selected characteristics: physically or sexually maltreated by an adult before age 15
five or more alcoholic drinks in one sitting (binge drinking) during the month preceding the survey
used drugs during the month preceding the survey
number of evening activities during the month preceding the survey
ever been homeless or temporarily lived somewhere because you had nowhere else to live
sense of belonging to local community
likelihood that neighbours call the police if witness what seems like criminal behaviour
